[@microsoft/fast-foundation](./fast-foundation.md) &gt; [Anchor](./fast-foundation.anchor.md) &gt; [hreflang](./fast-foundation.anchor.hreflang.md)

## Anchor.hreflang property

Hints at the language of the referenced resource. See [&lt;a&gt; element](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/a) for more information.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
hreflang: string;
```

## Remarks

HTML Attribute: hreflang
